entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lunenburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:42 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lunenburg 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: NNW 9 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 7 except minus 11 in low lying areas.
